title: NFL Playoffs are set, Raiders avoid tie with Chargers, Jaguars send Colts home, Coaching Changes aplenty, and Super Wild Card Weekend Previews
itunes:title: NFL Playoffs are set, Raiders avoid tie with Chargers, Jaguars send Colts home, Coaching Changes aplenty, and Super Wild Card Weekend Previews
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara paint the NFL Playoff landscape that finished with the Raiders OT win over the Chargers. Did an unexpected timeout from LA change the Raiders minds about taking a tie? A gut-wrenching loss by the Colts to the Jaguars could have Indy fans questioning Carson Wentz through the offseason. The Bears, Vikings, and Dolphins all start their postseason moves with head coaching changes and more. TJ Watt, Tom Brady and Jimmy Garoppolo get Game Balls for their final regular season games. We also look at the Super Wild Card Weekend games that the crew is looking forward to watching.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
